name: Tubular Rift
description: Tubular Rift: In the far-flung future race on different planets. In old tubes meant to hit the rift. The rift being another dimension parallel to our own. The rewards are great! The consequences are even greater! Excerpt: 1: The game has full controller support for the Xbox 360 in game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Any
